Windows like back in episode 77 this indicates where the bottom of a window

peace square your walkway should be a perfect 90 degrees so if you force the

quick note if you're doing a single wall not a corner then you'll see that you

black bomb now I actually decided to do this the long way brushed on acrylic
craft paint instead of a spray the reason is even if all the foam is
protected the propellant in the spray paint can still cause unwanted reactions
I've seen it dissolve certain glues and I've seen it cause the paper to separate
from the foam core inside actually here's an example on a failed piece that
I abandoned because of that see the paper bubbling up so that done first up
is dark gray we're gonna do an over brush which is really just a heavy dry
brush so load up the paint on the brush and then work it back off in the palette
a little bit and then just start attacking the piece now it's gonna look
horrible you're gonna think oh my god this is not working but stick with it
trust me keep working it all over so you get a good dusty gray appearance I'd say
like 80% coverage so the black underneath is definitely still a factor
and while we have that color out let's go ahead and dry brush the base to
fairly heavy dry brush 80% coverage make sure to randomly change the direction of
your brush strokes and now plain grey again a healthy dry
brush over the whole thing but bit less maybe 50% coverage this time and you
want to strive to generally keep your brush strokes in the same direction up
and down to help emphasize that illusion of height on the building and again do
the base while you're at it let all that texture do the work for you start gentle
you can always put more on but you can't take it back off and now we assemble
apply the hot glue to the base itself rather than the building I find it
easier that way then quickly put the base on the table pinning it down so
it's perfectly flat if it isn't already and then slide the building up so it
fits like a glove keep the pressure on for a good minute just to be safe again
for the single wall pieces you can see that there isn't much support for that
